column5: Hey all.  So I'm heading over to the Bog after lunch today and was wondering where I can get some live bait between Whitby and the Bog?  Thanks folks!  Geoff
Causeway Bait and Tackle on Hwy 7. On your way up the hill towards the casino.

So the report goes like this. Perch, perch, perch, perch, perch, perch, perch, perch, perch, perch, perch and more perch.  To bad I had to get going before the walleye bite got going...  Considering I have never fished for perch it was fun!
